mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = 'circle01'

select COMMUNITY_POST.POST_NUMBER, COMMUNITY_POST.COMMUNITY_TITLE, COMMUNITY_POST.MEMBER_ID, COMMUNITY_POST.COMMUNITY_DATE, COMMUNITY_POST.VIEW_COUNT, (select count(*) from POST_COMMENT WHERE POST_NUMBER = COMMUNITY_POST.POST_NUMBER) as cmt_cnt from COMMUNITY_POST join POST_COMMENT on POST_COMMENT.POST_NUMBER = COMMUNITY_POST.POST_NUMBER GROUP BY COMMUNITY_POST.POST_NUMBER, COMMUNITY_POST.COMMUNITY_TITLE , COMMUNITY_POST.MEMBER_ID, COMMUNITY_POST.COMMUNITY_DATE, COMMUNITY_POST.VIEW_COUNT ;

select LECTURE.LECTURE_TITLE,MEMBER.MEMBER_NAME, LECTURE.LECTURE_NUMBER from LECTURE join ENROLLMENT on LECTURE.LECTURE_NUMBER = ENROLLMENT.LECTURE_NUMBER join MEMBER on MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = ENROLLMENT.MEMBER_ID WHERE MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = 'circle01'
